Package com.izforge.izpack

Class Summary
CustomData Container for serialized custom data.
ExecutableFile Encloses information about a executable file.
GUIPrefs This class holds the GUI preferences for an installer.
Info Contains some informations for an installer, as defined in the section of the XML files.
Info.Author This class represents an author.
LocaleDatabase Represents a database of a locale.
Pack Represents a Pack.
PackFile Encloses information about a packed file.
Panel  
ParsableFile Encloses information about a parsable file.
UpdateCheck Encloses information about an update check.
XPackFile Extends the packfile by the information at which file position an entry is stored
